title: I built the first iPhone with Steve Jobs. The AI industry is at risk of repeating an early smartphone mistake
description: When I was at Apple, we didn’t just launch the smartphone era—we built an ecosystem.
content: Were in the midst of a meteoric rise of data centers promising power, server space, and economic opportunity across America. But the data center boom is already at risk of becoming a bust unless we s… [+5906 chars]
